org.odk.collect.android.widgets
Interface IQuestionWidget

All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioWidget, BarcodeWidget, DateWidget, DecimalWidget, GeoPointWidget, ImageWidget, IntegerWidget, SelectMultiWidget, SelectOneWidget, StringWidget, TimeWidget, TriggerWidget, VideoWidget
public interface IQuestionWidget

QuestionWidgets are the main elements in QuestionView. QuestionView is a ScrollView, so widget designers don't need to worry about scrolling. Each widget does need to handle the 'ReadOnly' case in BuildView().

Author:
Carl Hartung (carlhartung@gmail.com)
